Weather service warns of severe thunderstorms

The National Weather Service predicted quarter-sized hail and 60 miles-per-hour winds for parts of Middlesex, Suffolk, and Norfolk counties. (Globe, 5:39 p.m.)

Sandusky found guilty on 45 counts

The former Penn State assistant football coach was convicted of 45 counts of sexual assaulting 10 boys he befriended through his charity. (Boston Globe)

38 Studios struggled for months before bankruptcy

Curt Schilling said his video game company collapsed suddenly, but public records and interviews show the venture was in trouble for much longer. (Boston Globe)
